courses.title: Guitar for Beginners
courses.description: Start your music journey with basic guitar chords, strumming, and tunes.

courses.title: Piano Essentials
courses.description: Learn piano basics, music theory, and play your first songs with ease.

courses.title: Vocal Training - Level 1
courses.description: Improve your pitch, tone, and vocal range with professional exercises.

courses.title: Indian Classical Music Basics
courses.description: Dive into ragas, taals, and surs of Indian classical music.

courses.title: Drum Beats Mastery
courses.description: Master rhythms, grooves, and coordination on the drum kit.

courses.title: Music Theory 101
courses.description: Understand the foundation of music: notes, scales, chords, and harmony.

courses.title: Digital Music Production
courses.description: Create and produce music using FL Studio, Ableton, or Logic Pro.

courses.title: Singing for Stage
courses.description: Learn to perform live with confidence and stage presence.

courses.title: Ukulele Basics
courses.description: Pick up the ukulele and play popular tunes in just weeks.

courses.title: Rap & Hip-Hop Vocal Flow
courses.description: Master lyrical flow, rhythm, and voice delivery for rap vocals.

courses.title: Advanced Guitar Solos
courses.description: Learn lead guitar techniques, improvisation, and solo composition.

courses.title: Carnatic Music Foundations
courses.description: Get introduced to swaras, alankaras, and talas of Carnatic music.

courses.title: Film Scoring Essentials
courses.description: Compose cinematic music for movies and short films using digital tools.

courses.title: Stage Sound Engineering
courses.description: Learn live sound setup, EQ, mic placement, and mixing basics.

courses.title: Bollywood Singing Styles
courses.description: Sing with emotion and nuance, mimicking Bollywood legends.

courses.title: Harmonium Mastery
courses.description: Explore Indian folk and classical melodies on the harmonium.

courses.title: Choral Singing Techniques
courses.description: Join harmony-focused choral sessions for group vocal training.

courses.title: DJing & Live Mixing
courses.description: Get started with turntables, controllers, and beat-matching basics.

courses.title: Sound Design for Games
courses.description: Design immersive audio environments for game development.

courses.title: Composing for Ads & Jingles
courses.description: Write catchy tunes and hooks for ads, radio, and brands.
